title: Full Stack Developer - Luciano Aguirre
description: Full Stack Developer from Buenos Aires, Argentina. Specialist in React, TypeScript, Node.js, SQL/NoSQL, Azure.

hero.title: Hello I'm Luciano Aguirre!
hero.job_title: Full Stack Developer from Buenos Aires, Argentina.
hero.description: Specialist in React / Vue, TypeScript, Node.js, SQL/NoSQL, Azure.

jobs_description.title: Full Stack Developer
jobs_description.description: Providing full-stack development services for diverse clients across Latin America and international markets. Specializing in modern web applications using React ecosystem, implementing responsive designs with advanced animations and micro-interactions. Developed e-commerce platforms with integrated payment gateways, real-time analytics dashboards, and scalable cloud infrastructure on Azure and AWS. Successfully delivered projects ranging from corporate websites to complex SaaS applications, consistently exceeding client expectations in performance optimization and user experience.

jobs_description.title: Full Stack Developer
jobs_description.description: Responsible for frontend development on PromoHub, using technologies such as React, ViteJS, JavaScript, SCSS, Tailwind, Git, SQL Server, and Azure. Platform refactoring for commercialization to major beer brands, implementing Google Analytics for user tracking, under SCRUM methodology.

jobs_description.title: Full Stack Developer
jobs_description.description: Responsible for frontend development of Augmented Reality on the 8thwall platform. Using TypeScript, React, MongoDB, Node, ViteJS, SCSS, and Tailwind.

jobs_description.title: Frontend Mentor
jobs_description.description: Conducted live classes following agile SCRUM methodologies, teaching HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, Vue3, and Firebase.

jobs_description.title: Full Stack Developer Trainee
jobs_description.description: Graduate of an intensive coding bootcamp that simulates a real work environment through the execution of various projects under SCRUM methodology. Using the MERN stack.

projects.title: Coca Cola - Locales (Massive)

The project showcases content management system, dynamic rankings and interactive forms. Modern frontend built with current web technologies to maximize user engagement and participation in the promotional campaign.

about.title: About me
about.subtitle: I'm a Full Stack Developer with a passion for frontend, with over 4 years of professional experience
about.description: Full Stack Developer specialized in React and modern technologies, with proven experience working for digital agencies and major brands. I master the complete stack from frontend (React, Next.js, TypeScript, Tailwind) to backend (Node.js, MongoDB, PostgreSQL) and cloud (Azure, AWS). I have led commercial platform refactoring, developed Augmented Reality experiences, and mentored new developers. My focus is on creating scalable and optimized solutions, always under agile methodologies like SCRUM, which makes me a versatile and committed professional for any technological challenge.
